synopsis.text:
Their world was once a serene tapestry of medieval charm, but the tranquil land of Villgust now finds itself on the precipice of destruction. A malevolent deity stirs, birthing monstrous abominations that sow terror and chaos. As the darkness threatens to consume all, the divine Windina, a benevolent goddess, takes notice.

In a bold move, Windina selects eight unconventional champions to combat the looming menace. Among them are Fanna, a nimble archer, Chris, a royal-blood turned warrior, Kui, a steadfast soldier, and Yuuta, a master swordsman. Their mission: vanquish the monstrous hordes and their formidable leader, Gavady.

Armed with divine blessings and an eclectic mix of skills, this motley crew of heroes embarks on a perilous journey to restore peace to Villgust. Despite their oddities, they are united in their resolve to thwart the encroaching darkness. Will their unique strengths be enough to save their world, or will the sinister forces prove too powerful to overcome? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of courage, camaraderie, and the struggle between light and darkness.
